Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
eqOsg::ApplicationSets up the whole eqOsg Equalizer application
eqOsg::ChannelThe Channel renders the frames in frameDraw()
eqOsg::ConfigThis class handles the eqOsg basic config for Equalizer
crf::crfConfigThis class extends the basic eqOsg config class with support vor event forwarding to the pipe's viewer
crf::crfNodeFactoryThis class generates the crf Equalizer objects
crf::crfPipeThe crf pipe inherits from the basic eqOsg pipe, to add more features like event-adapting, scenegraph updates etc
crf::crfStarterThis class provides easly handable run() methods to start an equalizer application with OSG scene data
eqOsg::FrameData::DataThe FrameData's struct to hold members
eqOsg::EqViewerA Viewer which can be used with Equalizer
eqOsg::FrameDataFrameData holds all data which is updated each frame
eqOsg::InitDataThe init data holds all data which is needed during initalization
eqOsg::NodeA node represents the renderclient
eqOsg::NodeFactoryOur eq node factory to create the eqOsg objects
eqOsg::PipeThe Pipe holds the viewer and the frame data
crf::SceneReaderThis class provides an advanced *.osg file load mechanism
